messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, [Personal anecdote and background]... With extensive business experience... I promise 'Real Change' for Hastings and Rye, that I will work tirelessly for your interests at all times.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will pump an additional £3 billion a year into the NHS to ensure it remains a free and high-quality public service despite soaring costs.
UKIP will SCRAP inheritance tax and take those on minimum wage out of tax to help families, especially those with children who have been left behind.
UKIP believes it is time to redirect some of the £9 billion foreign aid budget to help our own citizens in the UK.

issues.health: UKIP will pump an additional £3 billion a year into the NHS to ensure it remains a free and high-quality public service despite soaring costs.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
issues.socialWelfare: take those on minimum wage out of tax to help families

leaflet.personalStatement: I am East Sussex born and bred. I have a Master’s Degree in European Politics from the UofE and I've been married for 28 years and I believe in family values.
